kpi.name: M5006C0

kpi_info.title: MAXIMUM NUMBER OF AVAILABLE R99 CHANNEL ELEMENTS
kpi_info.use: The maximum number of available R99 Channel Elements. In Ultrasite EUBB WCDMA BTS counter there is the maximum amount of working baseband resources (HW capacity). In Flexi rel2 WCDMA BTS when baseband pooling is not used, a counter is the maximum amount of licensed capacity. In Flexi rel2 WCDMA BTS when baseband pooling is in use, a counter is the maximum amount of Local Cell Group dedicated baseband pool R99 CE capacity + total amount of R99 CEs in common baseband pool - R99CEs used by other Local Cell groups from common baseband pool at the counter sampling moment.

kpi.kpi_alias: MAXIMUM NUMBER OF AVAILABLE R99 CHANNEL ELEMENTS
